help-file.title: DREADLORD
help-file.content:
Dreadlords, also knows as the Eyeless, are the warlords of the undead. They are the result of a dark and terrible ritual performed on a person. The end of the ritual is marked by the person sacrificing his eyes by clawing them out and then giving his life to the Dark Lords. If he is deemed worthy he will once again rise, this time as an undead, a Dreadlord. If he is not deemed worthy he has an eternity in the pits of hell to ponder his arrogance. The loss of their eyes does not, as many believe, encumber the Eyeless in any way. Instead they are giving a seventh sense by which they can perceive their surroundings. This also makes them immune against blindness and other things that would normally affect eyesight, such as daylight and darkness, yet sensitive to extremes of heat. A Dreadlord is a feared fighter, a master in the use of two-handed weapons, spreading the taint of the dead as they fight. Even their blood can kill. They are also trained in the art of leading and are deadly while commanding a force.
Allowable races: Lich, Vampire, Shade. Equipment usage: Like all classes on Duris, Dreadlords have their own item restrictions. They can use most heavy armor and weapons but are more limited in using magical items. Innate Abilities: Acid Blood, Inability to Blind.
